entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Blowing snow this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:11 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 8:11 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 9.
